subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ José Reyes is one of a record 246 players on opening day rosters who were born outside the 50 states. The total surpasses the previous record of 242.
snippet: The Mets’ José Reyes is one of a record 246 players on opening day rosters who were born outside the 50 states. The total surpasses the previous record of 242.
